comments:
We've seen the following stack trace several times. The problem is intermittent and occurrs in various contexts.

Michael,

Have you had a chance to look at this? Any chance that this will be fixed for 3.3?
This appears to be an exception from the internals of the Resources plug-in. Moving to Platform/Resources for comment.

This is a concurrency problem, so the more details you can provide, the better. First, I assume you are running with a recent 3.3 milestone (a bug like this was fixed early in 3.3 - bug 134364). Does it only happen while running automated tests? Does it only happen on certain machines, OSes, VMs, etc?
